publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-953 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees a revision to the programme of business for Wednesday 25 February 2004, as follows- after, 2.30 pm Time for Reflection - Mr Habib Malik, a director of Multi Ethnic Aberdeen Limited and Scotland Area Manager for Islamic Relief followed by Parliamentary Bureau Motions insert, followed by Ministerial Statement on Fresh Talent Supported by: Tavish Scott*
